Date: Friday, 1/31/1992
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Willie Pettis



Date: Tuesday, 2/4/1992
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Boston (UBA)!

Regards,
Willie Pettis



Date: Friday, 5/9/1992
Subject: Status of Evelio Lizarraga
Dear Sir,
Evelio Lizarraga has problems at AA Scituate Somersets!
He has an ERA of 5.81, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/14/1992
Subject: Mickey McGrath is sick...
Diagnosis: Sore Back.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor

William Carolan

Subject: Status of Alejandro Montalto
Dear Sir,
Alejandro Montalto shouldn't play at AA Scituate Somersets!
He has an AVG of .247 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
